Title: Dragon Ball Z: Lord Slug
Writer: Akira Toriyama (original manga "Dragon Ball"), Takao Koyama (screenplay), Neil Bligh (Writer: English Version)
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Toshio Furukawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Plot: When an asteroid nearly destroys Planet Earth, a space ship emerges from the asteroid and lands on Earth. The new terror is Lord Slug, a nomadic alien who plans to destroy all life on Earth, and the only one who can stop him is Goku!
